root.name: Mystery Masters
root.description: Compilation of 15 casual games: hidden object, adventure, match-3. Games included: The Stolen Venus, Treasure Masters, Magic Encyclopedia: Moonlight, Magic Encyclopedia: Book One, Natalie Brooks and the Treasure of the Lost Kingdom, Natalie Brooks and the Secrets of the Treasure House, The Treasures of Mystery Island, Adventures in Time, Alabama Smith: Escape from Pompeii, Mystery Cookbook, Curse of Montezuma, The Treasures of Montezuma, Heroes of Hellas, Magic Land and Mystery of the Bermuda Triangle.
